name: Line Dodger
description:
In Line Dodger, you play an hexagon in a an arena. You must avoid red lines, but be sure not pick up blue items as they will make you bigger.

Accumlate as much score as you can but be careful, it gets harder.

Line Dodger was developed in 4 days for training for Ludum Dare 46. It was inspired by the theme of Ludum Dare 40: 'The more you have, the worse it is'

Input: the game was developed on a controller but it is also playable with a mouse.

You can also play this game in your browser.
